00014 namespace Util
00015 {
00016 
00017    /*
00018    * Serialize an OrthoRegion to/from an archive.
00019    */
00020    template <class Archive>
00021    void OrthoRegion::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00022    {
00023       ar & minima_;
00024       ar & maxima_;
00025       ar & lengths_;
00026       ar & halfLengths_;
00027       ar & volume_;
00028    }
00029 
00030    /*
00031    * Serialize an OrthorhombicBoundary to/from an archive.
00032    */
00033    template <class Archive>
00034    void 
00035    OrthorhombicBoundary::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00036    {
00037       OrthoRegion::serialize(ar, version);
00038       serializeEnum(ar, lattice_, version);
00039       reset();
00040       if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00041          isValid();
00042       }
00043    }
00044 
00045 }
00046 #endif
